EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Jun15 Open Customer Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}: Thank you for registering for the Intapp Open Customer Webinar. It will take place on June 23rd at 9am Pacific / 12pm Eastern / 5pm BST. Please use the link below to add the event to your calendar, which contains the login information to access the webinar.
Add to Calendar: http://intapp.com/images/webinars/calendar-events/Intapp_Open_Customer_Webinar.ics
http://www.intapp.com
All information Copyright 2015 Intapp, Inc. All rights reserved.
